extension.description: Search and download subtitles from subtitles.gr, xsubs.tv and subz.xyz
Εύρεση και λήψη υποτίτλων από τα subtitles.gr, xsubs.tv και subz.xyz
extension.disclaimer: This service is only for Greek subtitles and not published nor endorsed by subtitles.gr, xsubs.tv and subz.xyz
Υπηρεσία μόνο ελληνικών υποτίτλων που δεν έχει δημοσιευθεί ούτε εγκριθεί από τα subtitles.gr, xsubs.tv και subz.xyz

extension.news:
[B]1.5.3[/B] - Improved subtitle search for tv shows - Improved handling of subtitles choice on multisubs archives - Boolean check of archive format with is_zipfile instead of endswith - Various other tweaks
[B]1.5.0 - 1.5.2[/B] - Fixed subz.xyz (by not loading the xbmcvfs module through kodi_six) - Subtitles search can also be performed via listitem query (useful when searching via context menu) - Tweaked string formatting on all modules - Added Python 3 compatibility (not yet tested) - Implemented capability to select subtitle from rar archives that have multiple subtitles (up to second subdirectory level) - Bump dependencies
